data.name: Biomes: Survival Era
data.detailed_description:
biomes: Survival Era

is a top-down, sandbox, solo or 4-player-coop, open-world crafting survival game.

The first version will appear as a regular survival adventure in a map based on the biomes of North America.
You will fight against animals and also flee from them, as well as harvest plants and mine rocks in order to use their raw materials in the manufacture of new weapons, tools and clothing. Either alone or with your friends you can build houses and explore the wilderness.

Features

  • Unreal Engine 5
  • Satisfy your hunger and thirst
  • Craft items and equipment
  • Various biomes with their native animal and plant species
  • Hunt animals and harvest crops
  • Tame animals that will accompany you on your adventures as a fighter, transporter or mount
  • day-night cycle
  • Seasons with leaves in summer and bare branches in winter
  • Resources that can be harvested depending on the season
  • Character creation
  • And much more...

Pre Release

As long as the game has not yet been released, videos will be published on my Youtube-Channel.
You can also join my Discord-Server to stay up to date, sometimes I am also looking for people to test new functions. Of course, you can also talk to like-minded people there and make new friends who might want to play with you.

Idea behind this game

The idea behind this game is that animals and plants only appear in their native biomes before humans have messed everything up, including species that have been extinct and exclusive, introduced new species by humans.

data.short_description: Your last memory is a bright, glistening light in the water ... then you woke up in a world in which primates never existed and you are fighting for your life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 4 Core - 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB or higher (DX 11 recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 4 Core - 3 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB or higher (DX 11 recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
You can kill enemies.
Human players and enemies can be naked.
